name: Day Two Ab Hiit
description: Ab focused workout with 6 exercises, 1 set each, 30 seconds per exercise

workouts.name: Sprinter Abs
workouts.description: Lie on your back, lift legs to 90 degrees, and alternate bringing knees to chest quickly

workouts.name: Flutter Kicks
workouts.description: Lie on your back, lift legs slightly off the ground, and alternate kicking them up and down

workouts.name: Reverse Crunches
workouts.description: Lie on your back, lift legs to 90 degrees, and curl hips off the ground towards your chest

workouts.name: V Sit ups
workouts.description: Sit on the ground with legs extended, lean back and lift legs to form a 'V' shape, then return to start

workouts.name: Plank
workouts.description: Start in a plank position on hands, keeping body straight from head to heels

workouts.name: Feet out to in
workouts.description: Start in a plank position on hands, jump feet out wide and then back together
